languages.text: {n}Вздохнув, Джай с мягкой улыбкой разводит руками.{/n} "Значит, Великий задумал для наше страсти иные оазисы, в которых мы утолим жажду. Не печальтесь в сердце своем об этом, шерин. Вольному Торговцу не должны быть ведомы печали".

{n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."
languages.original_text: {n}Вздохнув, Джай с мягкой улыбкой разводит руками.{/n} "Значит, Великий задумал для наше страсти иные оазисы, в которых мы утолим жажду. Не печальтесь в сердце своем об этом, шерин. Вольному Торговцу не должны быть ведомы печали".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae suspira, se encoge de hombros y te sonríe.{/n} «Entonces el Exaltado tiene otros planes para nuestras pasiones, otros oasis donde saciar nuestra sed. No sufra por ello, shereen. Un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no debe conocer el pesar».
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae suspira, se encoge de hombros y te sonríe.{/n} «Entonces el Exaltado tiene otros planes para nuestras pasiones, otros oasis donde saciar nuestra sed. No sufra por ello, shereen. Un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no debe conocer el pesar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊叹了口气，耸耸肩，对你露出了温柔的微笑。{/n}“看来，至高无上的神皇对我们的激情另有安排，我们会在其他绿洲解渴。不要为此悲伤，亲爱的。行商浪人不应知晓悲伤为何物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊叹了口气，耸耸肩，对你露出了温柔的微笑。{/n}“看来，至高无上的神皇对我们的激情另有安排，我们会在其他绿洲解渴。不要为此悲伤，亲爱的。行商浪人不应知晓悲伤为何物。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ため息をつきながらジェイは肩をすくめ、あなたに向かって柔らかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはあたしたちのこの情熱に関して別の計画を持ってるみたいだわ。あたしたちの渇きを癒す別のオアシスをね。悲しまないでちょうだい、シャリーン。自由開拓者は悲しみなんて知らないのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.locale_text: {n}ため息をつきながらジェイは肩をすくめ、あなたに向かって柔らかな笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンはあたしたちのこの情熱に関して別の計画を持ってるみたいだわ。あたしたちの渇きを癒す別のオアシスをね。悲しまないでちょうだい、シャリーン。自由開拓者は悲しみなんて知らないのだから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un soupir, Jae hausse les épaules et vous adresse un sourire compréhensif.{/n} « Or donc, l'Exalté a d'autres projets pour nos cœurs respectifs, d'autres oasis où nous étancherons notre soif. Ne pleurez pas ce qui n'était pas censé être, shereen. {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} ne doit pas se laisser ronger par le regret. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un soupir, Jae hausse les épaules et vous adresse un sourire compréhensif.{/n} « Or donc, l'Exalté a d'autres projets pour nos cœurs respectifs, d'autres oasis où nous étancherons notre soif. Ne pleurez pas ce qui n'était pas censé être, shereen. {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} ne doit pas se laisser ronger par le regret. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae seufzt, zuckt mit den Schultern und lächelt dich sanft an.{/n} "Dann hat der Erhabene eben andere Pläne für unsere Leidenschaften — andere Oasen, an denen wir unseren Durst stillen werden. Trauert nicht darum, Shereen. Ein Freihändler sollte keine Trauer kennen."
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

languages.text: {n}Jae iç çekiyor, omuz silkiyor ve sana yumuşakça gülümsüyor.{/n} "Demek Görkemli'nin tutkularımız için başka planları, susuzluğumuzu dindireceğimiz başka vahalar var. Kalbine bu yüzden keder çökmesin şirinim. Bir Hür Tacir, hüzün nedir bilmemeli."
languages.original_text: {n}Sighing, Jae shrugs and gives you a soft smile.{/n} "So the Exalted One has other plans for our passions — other oases at which we will quench our thirst. Do not grieve in your heart for this, shereen. A Rogue Trader should not know sorrow."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
